text: @seanhannity @LindseyGrahamSC @AlexBerenson @DrOz @marklevinshow @KarlRove What lies, deceit and disinformation are you going to spread tonight? Try to lie your way out of Trump closing down testing sites. I know you don't want accurate numbers because then it is easier to lie #COVID19
